title: Rupauli (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
text:
Rupauli (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is an <a href="Vidhan%20Sabha">assembly</a> constituency in <a href="Purnia%20district">Purnia district</a> in the <a href="India">India</a>n <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> of <a href="Bihar">Bihar</a>.
Overview.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order, 2008, No 60. Rupauli (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Rupauli and <a href="Bhawanipur%20%28Community%20development%20block%29">Bhawanipur</a> <a href="Community%20Development%20Block%20in%20India">community development blocks</a>; Aurlaha, Bhatsara, Laxmipur, Nathpur, Patraha, Arbanna Chakla, Thari and Basudeopur of Barhara Kothi CD Block.
Rupauli (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No 12 <a href="Purnia%20%28Lok%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Purnia (Lok Sabha constituency)</a>.
Election Results.
Assembly Elections 2020.
 
1957-2010.
In the <a href="2010%20Bihar%20legislative%20assembly%20election">2010 state assembly elections</a>, Bima Bharti of <a href="Janata%20Dal%20%28United%29">JD(U)</a> won the Rupauli assembly seat defeating her nearest rival Shankar Singh of <a href="Lok%20Janshakti%20Party">LJP</a>. Contests in most years were multi cornered but only winners and runners are being mentioned. Bima Bharti representing <a href="Rashtriya%20Janata%20Dal">RJD</a> defeated Shanakar Singh of LJP in <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Oct%202005">October 2005</a>. Shankar Singh of LJP defeated Bima Bharti of RJD in <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Feb%202005">February 2005</a>. Bima Bharti, contesting as an Independent candidate defeated Md. Alimuddin of <a href="Samajwadi%20Party">SP</a> in 2000. Bal Kishor Mandal of <a href="Communist%20Party%20of%20India">CPI</a> defeated Ram Chandra Das of SP in 1995. Saryug Mandal, Independent, defeated Jai Krishna Singh of <a href="Bharatiya%20Janata%20Party">BJP</a> in 1990. Dinesh Kumar Singh of <a href="Indian%20National%20Congress">Congress</a> defeated Saryug Mandal of CPI in 1985 and 1980. Shaligram Singh Tomar of <a href="Janata%20Party">JP</a> defeated Saryug Mandal of CPI in 1977.
